nodes.bodyText: What do you mean by else? You mean, fallback strategy? That you will find at SubnetIdProvider or at SubnetChooser, as they do different things on fallback (does this answer your question?)
you have an if, and this is the else part. makes the code easier to read if you don't have hidden returns

I am not sure I agree. I think this is opinion based, as some like single returns, whereas others prefer early returns. I personally think there is value in early returns as it avoids nesting and gives a clear flow to the code.
a bit strange that logresult returns
Yes, thanks for pointing that out! I added it.
